SELECT a.userid,username,headurl,max(days) signdays FROM user a,( SELECT userid,login_dt ,@cont_day := (CASE WHEN (@last_uid=userid AND DATEDIFF(login_dt,@last_dt)=1) THEN (@cont_day+1) ELSE 1 END) AS days ,(@cont_ix := (@cont_ix+IF(@cont_day=1,1,0))) AS cont_ix ,@last_uid:=userid, @last_dt:=login_dt FROM (SELECT userid ,DATE(signdate) AS login_dt FROM sign ORDER BY userid,login_dt) AS t ,(SELECT @last_uid:='',@last_dt:='',@cont_ix:=0,@cont_day:=0) AS t1 ) AS b where login_dt>=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and a.userid=b.userid GROUP BY b.userid ORDER BY signdays desc limit 20
